name: Zombie Kill Down Free
description: Zombie Kill Down is an action-packed thrill-hunting of walking dead where huge waves of zombie coming to you. Your job is to kill zombies before they enter to your area. You also have to save the civilians at the same time. There are 10 challenging and horrifying waves of men eaters. All zombies are not same they have their own characteristics and hence requires more powers to get killed. Join the Zombie Kill Down and find out, how to deal with different zombie types.
